title: France's Macron struggles for love at home
text:
France's Macron struggles for love at home 8:07pm GMT - 02:03 
French President Emmanuel Macron campaigned on being ''neither of the left, nor the right.'' But as faces down protests over his welfare and labor reforms, the young leader is finding that governing without a traditional power base has its price. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
French President Emmanuel Macron campaigned on being "neither of the left, nor the right." But as faces down protests over his welfare and labor reforms, the young leader is finding that governing without a traditional power base has its price.
